title: Idealite - Queensbay Mall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Organic, Western, Take-out, Malaysian
description: 品味舒食 operates multiple outlets. Advertises as a wholesome dining place. No add white sugar, white salt, MSG, synthetic. Uses whole grains, brown sugar, rock salt, fruits and vegetables that have been cleaned in an ozone machine.
streetAddress: 3F Queensbay Mall, 100, Persiaran Bayan Indah, Bayan Lepas
